get.description: Gets all users based on the search criteria.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point of the next set of results, after the limit specified in the limit field has been reached.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value: 25. Maximum: 100.

parameters.name: primaryEmail
parameters.description: The primary email of the user.

parameters.name: employeeID
parameters.description: The employee ID of the user.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user.

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: The last name of the user.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return active or inactive users. FORMAT: true or false

Active.description: Indicates whether the user is currently active or not.

CellPhoneNumber.description: The cell phone number of the user.

EmployeeID.description: The employee ID of the user.

FirstName.description: The first name of the user.

ID.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

LastName.description: The last name of the user.

LoginID.description: The login ID of the user.

MiddleName.description: The middle name of the user.

OrganizationUnit.description: The organization unit of the user.

PrimaryEmail.description: The primary email of the user.

NextPage.description: The URI of the next page of results, if any.
